Txt_punct: It uses provisionallypatented collection and processing technologies to create acellular bioscaffolds that help the body repair itself These implantable and superficially applied bioscaffolds use amnion the placenta material discarded during the birth of healthy animals Best of all AniCell’s technology is noninvasive not needing to create a wound to cure a wound It is affordable since it can be administered ONCE in the field at the time of fractured bones damaged ligaments and tendons joint inflammation eye injuries and superficial wounds There is no painful harvesting culturing waiting sterility collection concerns or ongoing therapy The technology has a significant proven track record in human burn victims and diabetic cases Finally the treatments are not subject to FDA Guidance  fulfilling a void in the market place vacated by existing cellular treatments These products can also be used to aid in reducing the effects of diseases like osteoarthrosis renal failure and early onset hip dysplasia in dogs

Txt_punct: Current treatment options for osteopenia and osteoporosis have major drawbacks Pharmaceuticals called bisphosphates eg Fosamax can be effective at limiting bone loss but they have numerous side effects including less severe annoyances like nausea and abdominal pain and more serious consequences like osteonecrosis of the jaw and atypical hip fractures Side effects are so bad that  of people discontinue use within  months and many more refuse to take them in the first place Alternative approaches to treating low bone mass are calcium supplements and weightbearing exercise Calcium alone does not decrease fracture risk Weightbearing exercise is effective but the average older adult does not perform exercise at the level needed to stimulate our bones like running and jumping jacks Therefore there is a growing need for a new treatment option

Name: Brilliantly
Overview: company first core offering inspired carbone preventative mastectomy reconstruction went years believing physical emotional side effects unique says connecting survivors social media groups carbone realized experiences shared including overwhelming sense cold affecting life could wear could kids carbone therefore developed brilliantly warm warming bra insert could allow women continue flourish without distracting cold feeling implant reconstruction focused breast cancer market ultimately could allow women comfortable discreet way carbone says hardly call niche market
Txt_punct: The company’s first core offering was inspired after Carbone’s  preventative mastectomy and reconstruction “I went through years believing that my physical and emotional side effects were unique to me” she says After connecting with other survivors through social media groups Carbone realized her experiences were shared including an overwhelming sense of being cold “It was affecting my life — what I could wear what I could do with my kids” Carbone therefore developed Brilliantly WARM a warming bra insert that could allow women to continue to flourish without the distracting cold feeling from implant reconstruction “For now we are focused on the breast cancer market but ultimately we could allow all women to be more comfortable in a more discreet way” Carbone says “I’d hardly call that a niche market”

Txt_punct: FitSense’s mission is to combine wearable technology with validated training programs to help athletes and coaches of all skill levels prevent injury and maximize performance FitSense Inc was founded in July  by Dr Carter Mitchell and Thomas Blackadar to combat the growing epidemic of Anterior Cruciate Ligament ACL injuries in young athletes around the world Our compression garments will transmit critical information regarding knee position in real time to a mobile device Using our interactive application athletes will be able to train properly on their own or under a coach’s supervision Research has shown that training which reinforces proper knee position can significantly decrease ACL injuries Historically this type of training has been reserved for elite athletes with access to expensive performance labs FitSense is bringing this level of analysis to the playing field and at a cost that will allow athletes of all skill levels to train more effectively We’re democratizing sensorbased training while delivering realtime feedback The FitSense founders have a unique combination of ACL injury expertise and wearable technology experience
